title: Mini-Ep 248: Ending On A Butt Dial
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 248: Ending On A Butt Dial
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree jump back into the 90’s to start their senior year of podcasting before hearing from listeners about how to incorporate a step-mom into your adult life, whether job-hopping is acceptable if you don’t like your job, and to praise Kate on ...
description:
Kate and Doree jump back into the 90’s to start their senior year of podcasting before hearing from listeners about how to incorporate a step-mom into your adult life, whether job-hopping is acceptable if you don’t like your job, and to praise Kate on being a proud romance author. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.

Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
